original_title: One Day Franz Brought Me to His House
overview: An experimental narrative film in which memories of the Nazi holocaust echo through late 1970's German society. Ernest Marrero and Susan Kouguell's ONE DAY FRANZ BROUGHT ME TO HIS HOUSE consists of printed texts from which simultaneous narratives unfold. This unfolding interaction of poetic and public language produces a complex narrative reading.
title: One Day Franz Brought Me to His House
